alert.note: Alert for Fort Bend; Inland Brazoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 4:22PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fort Bend and northwestern Brazoria Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 422 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pleak, or near Rosenberg, moving north northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and possible pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Sugar Land, Rosenberg, Richmond, Pecan Grove, Needville, Pleak, Fairchilds, Beasley, Orchard, Thompsons, Greatwood, New Territory, Cumings and western Riverstone. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
